title.rendered: BOSS AIR IN CAB CONTROL FOR ONBOARD AIR KITS

content.rendered:
BOSS AIR IN CAB CONTROL FOR ONBOARD AIR KITS

Boss Air In Cab Control for Onboard Air Kits available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

In Cab Control unit for vehicles fitted with an onboard air system as well as Load Assist Kits.

This system will allow control of your Load Assist kit from within the cab utilising your existing air tank/compressor system.

This kit includes;

  • 10mtrs J844 DOT certified air line
  • 1 x “Y” Check Valve
  • 2 “Y” connectors
  • 4 “T” connectors
  • 200PSI BOSS Dual Needle Gauge
  • Independent Left & Right “Dump Valves”
  •  Polished Aluminium Panel
  • 5 x 1/4″ push fittings
  • Momentary 12v Switch for actuating the Valve
  • Mini 12v Electric Solenoid/Valve
  • Fitting Instructions

PLEASE NOTE: This kit does not come with a Compressor or Tank

To view the range of Boss Air products available, CLICK HERE!
Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
